meanings.definition: Not prosperous; not successful or thriving.
meanings.sent1: The small town was unprosperous, with few job opportunities.
meanings.sent2: The unprosperous business struggled to stay afloat in the competitive market.
meanings.sent3: Despite their best efforts, the unprosperous farmers couldn't make ends meet.
meanings.sent4: Her unprosperous attempts at starting a new career left her feeling defeated.
meanings.sent5: The unprosperous garden reflected the neglect of its owner.

meanings.sent1: The unprosperous neighborhood had many abandoned houses.
meanings.sent2: His unprosperous investments led to financial difficulties.
meanings.sent3: The unprosperous party ended early due to lack of attendees.
meanings.sent4: She felt like an unprosperous student after failing her exam.
meanings.sent5: The unprosperous project was eventually abandoned due to lack of funding.
